name: qlax1i

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)))
-| wceq(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)))
-| wceq(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), c0)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), c0)
-| wcel(c0, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, cch)

comment: One of the equations showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice. (This corresponds to axiom "ax-1" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
